sections.sectionSummary: This simple walkthrough will explain the research study, the impact it may have on your life and will allow you to provide your consent to participate.
This study will ask you to perform tasks and respond to surveys.
This study will also gather sensor data from your iPhone and personal devices with your permission.
Collected data may allow researchers, as well as you, to understand patterns and details about Cardiovascular health.
Your data will be sent to a secure database, where it will be separated from your personal identity
Your de-identified data will be used for research and may be shared with other researchers.
Your participation in this study will take no more than 20 minutes per week.  We hope that you can participate at least for one week every three months.
Some of the tasks in this study will require you to answer to survey questions about various health and lifestyle factors.
Other tasks will ask you to complete active tasks that may require some light physical activity.
You may withdraw your consent and discontinue participation at any time.
The information collected by this study may help you better track and monitor your Cardiovascular health.
Some questions may make you uncomfortable.  Simply do not respond.
Participating in this study may change how you feel.  You may feel more tired, sad, energized, or happy.
Some of the data that you provide may be sensitive.  We will de-identify your data and use secure computers, but we cannot ensure complete privacy.
